attributes.action: Change UK Fishing Laws to protect our oceans from extinction.
attributes.additional_details: To help save our oceans and our planet for not only the human population in the present but also the future.
attributes.background: Change the UK Fishing Laws to reduce the amount of fish that can be caught on a daily basis to help protect the deterioration in numbers of our fish populations & save our oceans from extinction. The UK Government should be a world leader & show the way to help protect our ocean life & our planet.

rejection.details:
We think these petitions are similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553334
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581588

If you'd like something different, you could start a new petition setting out what.
